name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BMW M4 City Ride: Thrilling Live Wallpaper for Chrome!

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Experience the power and elegance of the BMW M4 on a city ride with this dynamic live wallpaper

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This live wallpaper brings the excitement of a BMW M4 speeding through the city streets, capturing the essence of luxury, speed, and modern design. As the car zooms across your screen, the urban landscape evolves, providing a thrilling backdrop that will enhance your browsing experience. Perfect for car enthusiasts or anyone who loves fast-paced visuals.

Along with the captivating car animation, the extension includes a customizable Google search bar, quick access to popular site shortcuts, and an always-visible date and time display. Stay organized while enjoying the dynamic energy of this high-performance BMW M4 city ride. Download now for an exciting new Chrome experience!
